InetWebHost Linux VPS runs on Open VZ technology which is controlled by SolusVM Panel gives the Linux VPS Servers to perform at a high standards with more reliability and scalability. Russia Linux VPS Plans are on Shared 100Mbps Network.
Russia Linux VPS - Main Hardware Nodes are located at Moscow, Russia, Data Center, connected with 100Mbps Network and 20TB Bandwidth per month.
